name: Sq1
description:
At Sq1 we strive every day to be strategic, fearless, creative and curious as we work to optimize relevant, real-time marketing experiences for our clients. We are a results-driven company that uses predictive modeling and conversion optimization methodology to prove ROI for clients like Wholly Guacamole, Dr Pepper, Michaels and Direct Energy.
Working alongside their traditional agencies, we provide insights into our client’s best performing customer segments, most effective messaging, multi-channel attribution modeling, consumer segmentation analysis, testing, conversion funnel analysis and many other disciplines.
It’s the first time an agency has developed a scalable methodology for carrying our conversion optimization that can actually impact a client’s business. We believe we’re creating a seismic shift in marketing. It’s more than a revolution. We’re rewriting the rules on what an agency is, what it does and what it’s capable of delivering for its clients.
You’ve never seen an agency do this before.
